metadata.Title: CVE-2023-28755 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: A ReDoS issue was discovered in the URI component through 0.12.0 in Ruby through 3.2.1. The URI parser mishandles invalid URLs that have specific characters. It causes an increase in execution time for parsing strings to URI objects. The fixed versions are 0.12.1, 0.11.1, 0.10.2 and 0.10.0.1.

notes.Note: tyhicks> ruby{1.9.1,2.0,2.3} and jruby ship an embedded rubygems.

criterions.comment: jruby: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
ruby1.9.1: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
ruby2.0: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
rubygems: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
